title: 南陇侯的邀约 · 收仆赴宴

scenes.description: 片头卷轴翻开，字幕提示“上一回 · 交易的艺术”，背景是晶龙阁夜色。

visual.composition: Golden scroll opening over Crystal Dragon Pavilion night skyline
visual.environment: Nighttime city lights with pavilion silhouette

scenes.prompt: xianxia fantasy title card, golden scroll unfolds above Crystal Dragon Pavilion night skyline, soft blue-gold glow, cinematic wide shot
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音，欢迎回来。第一百七十一集《南陇侯的邀约·收仆赴宴》。

scenes.description: 交换会场内灯火渐暗，修士陆续起身离场，只剩天晶真人在高台上收拢灵光。

visual.composition: Trading hall benches emptying while Tianjing Zhenren stands on platform

scenes.prompt: animated trading hall interior, cultivators stand up and leave under fading crystal lamps, Tianjing Zhenren on dais collecting light, cinematic pan
scenes.narration: 交换会收尾，天晶真人准备收摊，韩立却仍盯着那几具结丹巅峰傀儡不放。

scenes.description: 三具古铜色结丹傀儡排成一线，灵纹暗淡却杀意逼人。

visual.composition: Three bronze puppets aligned with faint arrays

scenes.prompt: close low-angle shot of three bronze battle puppets, faint glowing array lines, murderous aura, dramatic lighting
scenes.narration: 傀儡的纹路和姿态，正是昔日千竹教的路数，韩立一眼便看穿来源。

scenes.description: 韩立侧目观察，目中灵光掠过，心思飞转。

visual.composition: Han Li half profile, eyes reflecting puppet silhouettes

scenes.prompt: Han Li medium close-up, calm face yet eyes reflecting bronze puppets, cool rim lighting, xianxia cinematic
scenes.narration: 千竹教的傀儡术在灵界绝迹多年，这一次绝不能错过。

scenes.description: 灵石一袋袋砸在案几，仍旧无人愿意拿庚精换傀儡，气氛僵持。

visual.composition: Hands tossing spirit stones, Tianjing shakes head
visual.environment: Auction desk cluttered with jade slips

scenes.prompt: table close-up with spirit stone pouches piling up, cultivators gesturing anxiously, Tianjing refuses, tense auction atmosphere
scenes.narration: 庚精就是筹码，缺了它便是千金难买的遗憾，韩立只能暂时告退。

scenes.description: 韩立拂袖离开大堂，背影没入夜色，晶龙阁外灵灯摇曳。

visual.composition: Han Li walks down pavilion steps into night market glow
visual.environment: Crystal Dragon Pavilion exterior with lanterns

scenes.prompt: nighttime xianxia street, Han Li walks away from Crystal Dragon Pavilion, lantern light trailing behind, cinematic tracking shot
scenes.narration: 看似败兴离场，其实韩立已打定主意，夜里再与天晶真人单独谈判。

scenes.description: 午夜子时，晶龙阁上空弥漫雾气，韩立隐匿身形再度返回。

visual.composition: Fog-wrapped pavilion roof with lone figure landing
visual.character_pose: Han Li descending in azure light

scenes.prompt: moonlit fog surrounds Crystal Dragon Pavilion roof, Han Li descends in blue light, stealthy night scene
scenes.narration: 寅时，晶龙阁内外灵禁暂歇，正好方便两位元婴强者真心谈价。

scenes.description: 天晶真人释放灵压，满室寒风，试探韩立的底气。

visual.composition: Tianjing seated radiating pressure, Han Li stands calm opposite

scenes.prompt: two cultivators facing each other in jade chamber, one releases visible aura gusts, the other stands calm, dramatic lighting
scenes.narration: 先以灵压试探，再谈筹码，是天晶真人惯用的『交易的艺术』。

scenes.description: 韩立抬手，青竹蜂云剑化作剑阵光雨，轻描淡写破开灵压。

visual.composition: Sword lights circling Han Li, carving azure net

scenes.prompt: Han Li summons blue sword array within chamber, countless light blades spiral and disperse spiritual pressure, cinematic dynamic shot
scenes.narration: 青竹蜂云剑一亮，相互探底的游戏算是告一段落。

scenes.description: 韩立铺开储物袋，成堆阴冥兽魂石堆成小山，寒气扑面。

visual.composition: Mounds of ghostly soul stones emitting black mist

scenes.prompt: pile of ghostly blue-black soul stones on stone table, cold mist rising, Han Li's hand indicating wealth, cinematic overhead shot
scenes.narration: 一袋又一袋魂石拍在案上，天晶真人终于收起轻视，转而认真谈价。

scenes.description: 双方落座，桌上摆开傀儡炼制玉简与庚精线索，烛火摇曳。

visual.composition: Two cultivators seated across low table with jade slips

scenes.prompt: two cultivators sit across low jade table, jade slips and maps laid out, warm candlelight, intense negotiation atmosphere
scenes.narration: 魂石换傀儡图，同时换庚精情报，韩立步步逼价，天晶真人只得服软。

scenes.description: 特写玉简，浮现傀儡炼制工序的微缩幻影。

visual.composition: Jade slip hovering with projected puppet schematics

scenes.prompt: macro shot of glowing jade slip projecting puppet schematics in golden light, dark vignette background
scenes.narration: 玉简中记录着千竹教改良版傀儡术，韩立当场扫描，确认不是赝品。

scenes.description: 另一枚玉简展开庚精矿脉示意图，标注“幕兰草原”附近的隐秘矿带。

visual.composition: Holographic terrain map with glowing nodes

scenes.prompt: glowing jade map showing Muklan Prairie region with marked ore veins, mystical hologram style, tabletop view
scenes.narration: 庚精线索来自幕兰草原暗层，正吻合韩立接下来布局坠魔谷的打算。

scenes.description: 天晶真人起身拱手，口中笑喊“道友，请留步！”，神情真香。

visual.composition: Tianjing reaching forward, robe sleeves flaring

scenes.prompt: cultivator in ornate robe leaning forward calling out, humorous earnest expression, warm interior lighting
scenes.narration: 名场面再次上演，“道友请留步”成了弹幕狂刷的真香梗。

scenes.description: 月色下两人握手言欢，韩立收起玉简，化光离开。

visual.composition: Two silhouettes clasping forearms against moon

scenes.prompt: silhouetted cultivators clasp wrists atop pavilion under bright moon, robes fluttering, serene farewell
scenes.narration: 交易达成，韩立笑纳傀儡术与庚精情报，天晶真人也得了海量魂石。

scenes.description: 天色微明，阗天城街道慢慢热闹起来，摊贩开门。

visual.composition: Market street with rising sun fog

scenes.prompt: dawn shot of cultivation city street, vendors opening stalls, pale sunlight breaking through mist
scenes.narration: 第二天一早，城中消息四起，韩立也准备离城回宗。

scenes.description: 小杂货铺前围着一圈修士，争执声不断。

visual.composition: Group of cultivators arguing at storefront

scenes.prompt: daytime market alley crowded with cultivators arguing outside shop, handheld documentary feel
scenes.narration: 就在此时，韩立听见前方吵闹声，顺势拨开人群。

scenes.description: 孙火被店家围困，怒而亮出火属性符箓，却被嘲笑成穷鬼。

visual.composition: Young cultivator clutching talismans facing three shopkeepers

scenes.prompt: medium shot of young cultivator holding fire talismans facing bullying shopkeepers, harsh daylight, tense expressions
scenes.narration: 落云宗弟子孙火被刁难，只因一张火云符被狮子大开口。

scenes.description: 韩立一步踏入店内，青光一震逼退掌柜，众人惊呼。

visual.composition: Han Li framed in doorway with backlight, shopkeepers recoiling

scenes.prompt: Han Li steps into doorway, blue aura pushes bullies back, dramatic low-angle heroic shot
scenes.narration: 青光一震，掌柜直接被逼退，现场瞬间安静，只剩韩立淡淡开口。

scenes.description: 孙火认出韩立，立刻跪地行礼，画面切到韩立微微点头。

visual.composition: Young cultivator kneels, elder viewed from above

scenes.prompt: kneeling disciple salutes elder cultivator inside shop, respectful xianxia moment, soft lighting
scenes.narration: 上一次还在试剑大会与韩师叔并肩，如今再见已是天壤之别。

scenes.description: 韩立询问来历，孙火提到祖上孙二狗，回忆画面闪回黄枫谷旧景。

visual.composition: Overlay of present conversation with sepia memory frames
visual.environment: Split-scene shop and old mountain gate

scenes.prompt: split-scene showing present conversation and sepia flashback of Huang Feng Valley disciple, nostalgic overlay, warm lighting
scenes.narration: 原来孙火竟是昔日孙二狗的后人，一缕旧日情分让韩立心生怜惜。

scenes.description: 韩立递出主仆契约符，灵纹在二人之间形成束缚光链。

visual.composition: Two palms facing, golden rune chain connecting

scenes.prompt: close shot of two cultivators forming servant contract, golden rune chains linking their palms, mystical glow
scenes.narration: 孙火自愿签下契约，自此跟随韩立，落云宗又多了一名元婴级打手胚子。

scenes.description: 落云宗传讯玉牌亮起，南陇侯的请柬化作金色光鹤飞入屋中。

visual.composition: Golden light crane entering window, dropping jade invitation

scenes.prompt: magical golden light crane delivers jade invitation through window, shimmering particles, xianxia aesthetics
scenes.narration: 南陇侯亲自下帖，邀请韩立赴宴共商幕兰草原大事。

scenes.description: 韩立更换黑金长袍，孙火束发随侍，镜中映出二人新形象。

visual.composition: Han Li adjusting collar, Sun Huo standing behind

scenes.prompt: cultivator dons ornate black-gold robe before mirror, loyal follower stands behind tying hair, refined interior lighting
scenes.narration: 赴宴之前，师徒二人重新整装，气场瞬间拉满。

scenes.description: 青虹飞过幕兰草原上空，镜头俯视韩立与孙火赶赴南陇侯府的轻车。

visual.composition: Spirit carriage pulled by beasts over prairie

scenes.prompt: aerial shot of spirit beast carriage racing above Muklan Prairie, blue energy trails, cinematic travel
scenes.narration: 带着新收的孙火，韩立踏上赴宴之途，同时暗算王婵旧账。

scenes.description: 南陇侯府门前巨大的灵兽车停靠，门卫列阵迎接。

visual.composition: Massive mansion gate with banners and guards

scenes.prompt: grand mansion gate with banners, cultivator descends from ornate carriage while guards bow, bright sun
scenes.narration: 南陇侯铺排大阵仗接待，明显另有所图。

scenes.description: 宴会上灯烛辉煌，南陇侯端坐主位，诸宗代表依次落座。

visual.composition: Long banquet table with cultivators, host at head

scenes.prompt: lavish cultivation banquet hall, long table of representatives, Nanlong Hou at head, warm golden lantern light
scenes.narration: 幕兰草原则题名义上是合作，实则暗藏各派心思。

scenes.description: 鬼灵门少主王婵出场，一袭黑袍气质冷艳，脸庞稚嫩却带着危险的气息。

visual.composition: Elegant young woman in dark robe enters hall

scenes.prompt: dramatic entrance of elegant dark-robed young woman in banquet hall, spotlight highlights youthful face, cinematic dolly
scenes.narration: 鬼灵门少主王婵也到场，一袭黑袍气质冷艳，瞬间成为全场焦点。

scenes.description: 韩立与王婵目光交错，画面快速闪回燕家堡血战与传送阵伏杀。

visual.composition: Split-screen stare with flashback overlays

scenes.prompt: split close-up of Han Li and Wang Chan locking eyes, rapid flashback overlays of past battles, intense high-contrast lighting
scenes.narration: 仇人相见，韩立表面淡然，心底却回荡着燕家堡的血债与传送阵追杀之仇。

scenes.description: 预告彩蛋：宴会结束时天幕骤裂，空间裂缝闪出暗紫雷光。

visual.composition: Palace roof tearing open with portal lightning

scenes.prompt: dramatic night shot of palace roof as purple space rift forms overhead, lightning arcs and debris floating, ominous teaser
scenes.narration: 一闪而逝的空间裂缝昭示坠魔谷副本逼近，天南第一凶地的秘密即将揭开。

scenes.description: 画面淡出，夜色下的天南仙城剪影与灵光缓缓下落，字幕浮现“原创忘语”。

visual.composition: Night-time silhouette of Tiannan immortal city, spirit light drifting down
visual.environment: Night sky, city silhouette, drifting spirit particles
visual.fx: Spirit particles falling, fade-out, text overlay

scenes.prompt: xianxia ending, night silhouette of Tiannan cultivation city, spirit particles drifting, calm mystical mood, wide cinematic shot, film-grade lighting, 4K, text overlay '原创忘语'
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音，第一百七十二集的故事即将开始。喜欢的话请点赞支持一下！下集再见。
